content: What classic board game, invented in Germany, involves resource management and strategy to build settlements on an island?

The classic board game you're referring to is Settlers of Catan, also known simply as Catan. It was invented by Klaus Teuber and first published in 1995 in Germany. In Catan, players assume the roles of settlers establishing colonies on the island of Catan. The game involves resource management, trading, and strategic placement of settlements and roads to gather resources and build up your civilization. The goal is to be the first player to reach a set number of victory points, which can be achieved through various means such as building settlements, cities, developing cards, and controlling the longest road or largest army on the island.
